snippet: Gov. Kate Brown signed a bill making Oregon the first state to eliminate coal from its energy supply by legislation.
abstract: Oregon Gov Kate Brown signs bill into law that will make state first in nation to remove coal as energy source by legislation; phase-out will be completed by 2030.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Kate Brown signed a bill making Oregon the first state to eliminate coal from its energy supply by legislation.

headline.main: Oregon: Coal Will Be Phased Out
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Coal Will Be Phased Out
